document.masterDocTitle: Additions to the mirid (Hemiptera: Heteroptera) fauna of China, 2000 – 2006

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:

;

subSubSection.paragraph:
Alloeotomus humeralis
Zheng & Ma 2004
:474,476,478– 484 ,figs.4,13,14,17,18 (nov. spec. description, lateral view of, head and pronotum, vesica and parameres in different views, holotype ɗ, HUB , paratype 1 Ψ, SAX . Deposited in DBNU ). Host plant unknown.

paragraph.treatmentCitationGroup:
Alloeotomus kerzhneri :
Zheng & Ma 2004
: 464
–478,figs. 3 6, 9 , 10 . (redescription; distribution; vesica; parameres in different views; female genitalia. Examined specimens: holotype and paratypes of
Alloeotomus montanus
, 4 ɗ ɗ 7 ΨΨ, IM; others: BJ, HUB , GZ , JS , TJ , SAX , SD , SC , ZJ . Deposited in DBIMNU and DBNU ). Host plant unknown.
